sqlQuery.name: GeneComments
sqlQuery.sql:
WITH gene_comment as ( SELECT csi.comment_id,gi.gene as source_id, MAX(csi.stable_id) as stable_id FROM apidbtuning.geneid gi, ( SELECT comment_id, stable_id from @COMMENT_SCHEMA@comments@COMMENT_DBLINK@ UNION SELECT comment_id, stable_id from @COMMENT_SCHEMA@commentStableId@COMMENT_DBLINK@) csi WHERE gi.id = csi.stable_id GROUP by csi.comment_id,gi.gene )
SELECT c.comment_target_id, c.project_name as project_id, gene_comment.comment_id, gene_comment.source_id,gene_comment.stable_id, c.comment_date, c.headline, files.filecount, references.pmids, gene_counts.geneCount, case when reviewed_comments.reviewedcount > 0 then 'Yes' else 'No' end as comment_status, u.first_name || ' ' || u.last_name || ', ' || u.organization as user_name_org FROM @COMMENT_SCHEMA@comments@COMMENT_DBLINK@ c, @USER_SCHEMA@users@USER_DBLINK@ u, gene_comment, (SELECT comment_id, count(*) as filecount FROM @COMMENT_SCHEMA@CommentFile@COMMENT_DBLINK@ GROUP BY comment_id) files, (SELECT comment_id, apidb.tab_to_string(set(cast(collect(source_id) as apidb.varchartab)),',') as pmids FROM @COMMENT_SCHEMA@CommentReference@COMMENT_DBLINK@ WHERE database_name='pubmed' GROUP BY comment_id ) references, (SELECT comment_id, count(source_id) as geneCount FROM gene_comment GROUP BY comment_id) gene_counts, (SELECT dr.primary_identifier as comment_id, count(gf.source_id) as reviewedcount FROM sres.dbref dr, dots.DbRefNaFeature drnf, dots.GeneFeature gf, sres.externaldatabase ed, sres.externaldatabaserelease edr WHERE drnf.db_ref_id = dr.db_ref_id AND gf.na_feature_id = drnf.na_feature_id AND ed.external_database_id = edr.external_database_id AND edr.external_database_release_id = dr.external_database_release_id AND ed.name like '%_dbxref_EuPathDB_comment_RSRC' GROUP By dr.primary_identifier ) reviewed_comments WHERE c.project_name = '@PROJECT_ID@' AND c.comment_target_id = 'gene' AND c.review_status_id != 'rejected' AND c.review_status_id != 'task' AND c.review_status_id != 'community' AND c.is_visible = 1 AND c.comment_id = gene_comment.comment_id AND c.user_id = u.user_id AND c.comment_id = files.comment_id(+) AND c.comment_id = references.comment_id(+) AND c.comment_id = gene_counts.comment_id(+) AND to_char(c.comment_id) = reviewed_comments.comment_id(+) ORDER BY gene_comment.comment_id desc

sqlQuery.name: GeneComments
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT c.comment_target_id, c.project_name as project_id, csi.comment_id, csi.stable_id, csi.stable_id as source_id, c.comment_date, c.headline, files.filecount, references.pmids, gene_counts.geneCount, null as comment_status, u.first_name || ' ' || u.last_name || ', ' || u.organization as user_name_org FROM @COMMENT_SCHEMA@comments@COMMENT_DBLINK@ c, @USER_SCHEMA@users@USER_DBLINK@ u, ( SELECT comment_id, stable_id from @COMMENT_SCHEMA@comments@COMMENT_DBLINK@ UNION SELECT comment_id, stable_id from @COMMENT_SCHEMA@commentStableId@COMMENT_DBLINK@) csi, (SELECT comment_id, count(*) as filecount FROM @COMMENT_SCHEMA@CommentFile@COMMENT_DBLINK@ GROUP BY comment_id) files, (SELECT comment_id, apidb.tab_to_string(set(cast(collect(source_id) as apidb.varchartab)),',') as pmids FROM @COMMENT_SCHEMA@CommentReference@COMMENT_DBLINK@ WHERE database_name='pubmed' GROUP BY comment_id ) references, (SELECT comment_id, count(stable_id) as geneCount FROM @COMMENT_SCHEMA@commentStableId@COMMENT_DBLINK@ GROUP BY comment_id) gene_counts WHERE c.project_name = '@PROJECT_ID@' AND c.comment_target_id = 'gene' AND c.review_status_id != 'rejected' AND c.review_status_id != 'task' AND c.is_visible = 1 AND c.comment_id = csi.comment_id AND c.user_id = u.user_id AND c.comment_id = files.comment_id(+) AND c.comment_id = references.comment_id(+) AND c.comment_id = gene_counts.comment_id(+) ORDER BY csi.comment_id desc

sqlQuery.name: CommunityComments

sqlQuery.name: IsolateComments
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT ga.source_id, ga.project_id, apicomm.comment_id, apicomm.comment_target_id, apicomm.stable_id, apicomm.comment_date, apicomm.geneCount, apicomm.filecount, apicomm.pmids, apicomm.headline, apicomm.user_name_org FROM ApidbTuning.IsolateAttributes ga, (SELECT c.comment_target_id, c.project_name as project_id, csi.comment_id, csi.stable_id, c.comment_date, c.headline, files.filecount, references.pmids, gene_counts.geneCount, u.first_name || ' ' || u.last_name || ', ' || u.organization as user_name_org FROM @COMMENT_SCHEMA@comments@COMMENT_DBLINK@ c, @USER_SCHEMA@users@USER_DBLINK@ u, ( SELECT comment_id, stable_id from @COMMENT_SCHEMA@comments@COMMENT_DBLINK@ UNION SELECT comment_id, stable_id from @COMMENT_SCHEMA@commentStableId@COMMENT_DBLINK@) csi, (SELECT comment_id, count(*) as filecount FROM @COMMENT_SCHEMA@CommentFile@COMMENT_DBLINK@ GROUP BY comment_id) files, (SELECT comment_id, apidb.tab_to_string(set(cast(collect(source_id) as apidb.varchartab)),',') as pmids FROM @COMMENT_SCHEMA@CommentReference@COMMENT_DBLINK@ WHERE database_name='pubmed' GROUP BY comment_id ) references, (SELECT comment_id, count(stable_id) as geneCount FROM @COMMENT_SCHEMA@commentStableId@COMMENT_DBLINK@ GROUP BY comment_id) gene_counts WHERE c.project_name = '@PROJECT_ID@' AND c.comment_target_id = 'isolate' AND c.review_status_id != 'rejected' AND c.review_status_id != 'task' AND c.is_visible = 1 AND c.comment_id = csi.comment_id AND c.user_id = u.user_id AND c.comment_id = files.comment_id(+) AND c.comment_id = references.comment_id(+) AND c.comment_id = gene_counts.comment_id(+) ) apicomm WHERE ga.source_id = apicomm.stable_id AND ga.project_id = apicomm.project_id ORDER BY apicomm.comment_id desc

sqlQuery.name: CommentCategoryLink
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT c.stable_id AS source_id, '@PROJECT_ID@' as project_id, lower(t.category) || ':' || count(t.category) as category_link FROM @COMMENT_SCHEMA@comments@COMMENT_DBLINK@ c, @COMMENT_SCHEMA@TargetCategory@COMMENT_DBLINK@ t, @COMMENT_SCHEMA@CommentTargetCategory@COMMENT_DBLINK@ tc WHERE c.comment_id = tc.comment_id AND t.target_category_id = tc.target_category_id GROUP BY c.stable_id, t.category
